---
title: Make Schema
description: Create a schema file to define and validate the structure of data used in the application.
---

## Command
Follow this command to create a new schema.
```plaintext
lukio make:schema
```

## Available
This command is available for:
- Fullstack nextjs
- Backend hono

## Example
```plaintext
lukio make:schema
Enter your schema name: login
```

## Output
File will be created in `src/server/schema/login.schema.ts` for Fullstack nextjs and `src/schema/login.schema.ts` for Backend hono
```plaintext
/**
 * @author lukio-cli
 * @generated at 2000-01-01 00:00:00
 * This file is generated by lukio CLI
 */

import { z } from "zod";
const LoginSchema = z.object({
	example: z.string(),
});
export type LoginSchema = z.infer<typeof LoginSchema>;
export default LoginSchema;
```
